search.query: | rest splunk_server_group=dmc_group_indexer splunk_server_group="$dmc_group$" /services/server/info | fields + splunk_server | eval host_list="\"".splunk_server."\"" | stats values(host_list) as host_list | eval host_list=" (".mvjoin(host_list, ", ").")"
|rest splunk_server_group=dmc_group_cluster_master splunk_server_group=$dmc_group$ /services/server/info | table splunk_server
| tstats $hostwide_agg_function$(data.mem_used) as mem_used latest(data.mem) as capacity where index=_introspection host IN $host_list$ sourcetype=splunk_resource_usage by host _time $span$
| tstats $hostwide_agg_function$(data.normalized_load_avg_1min) as normalized_load_avg_1min where index=_introspection host IN $host_list$ sourcetype=splunk_resource_usage by host _time $span$

| tstats $hostwide_agg_function$(data.avg_total_ms) as avg_total_ms where component::iostats index=_introspection host IN $host_list$ sourcetype=splunk_resource_usage by host data.mount_point _time $span$
| `dmc_get_groups_containing_role(dmc_group_indexer)` | search search_group!="dmc_group_*"
| inputlookup dmc_assets | mvcombine search_group | search search_group=$dmc_group$ | where (search_group == "dmc_group_indexer") | table host

| rest splunk_server_group=dmc_group_cluster_master splunk_server_group=$dmc_group$ /services/properties/server/clustering/cluster_label | table splunk_server value
| rename value as cluster_label
| join splunk_server [| rest splunk_server_group=dmc_group_cluster_master splunk_server_group=$dmc_group$ /services/properties/server/clustering/multisite | table splunk_server value | rename value as multisite]
| join splunk_server [| rest splunk_server_group=dmc_group_cluster_master splunk_server_group=$dmc_group$ /services/properties/server/clustering/summary_replication | table splunk_server value | rename value as summary_replication]
| join splunk_server [| rest splunk_server_group=dmc_group_cluster_master splunk_server_group=$dmc_group$ /services/properties/server/clustering/heartbeat_timeout | table splunk_server value | rename value as heartbeat_timeout]
| join splunk_server [| rest splunk_server_group=dmc_group_cluster_master splunk_server_group=$dmc_group$ /services/properties/server/clustering/service_interval | table splunk_server value | rename value as service_interval]
| join splunk_server [| rest splunk_server_group=dmc_group_cluster_master splunk_server_group=$dmc_group$ /services/properties/server/clustering/site_replication_factor | table splunk_server value | rename value as site_replication_factor]
| join splunk_server [| rest splunk_server_group=dmc_group_cluster_master splunk_server_group=$dmc_group$ /services/properties/server/clustering/site_search_factor | table splunk_server value | rename value as site_search_factor]
| join splunk_server [| rest splunk_server_group=dmc_group_cluster_master splunk_server_group=$dmc_group$ /services/properties/server/clustering/replication_factor | table splunk_server value | rename value as replication_factor]
| join splunk_server [| rest splunk_server_group=dmc_group_cluster_master splunk_server_group=$dmc_group$ /services/properties/server/clustering/search_factor | table splunk_server value | rename value as search_factor]
| join splunk_server [| rest splunk_server_group=dmc_group_cluster_master splunk_server_group=$dmc_group$ /services/properties/server/clustering/available_sites | table splunk_server value | rename value as available_sites]
| join splunk_server [| rest splunk_server_group=dmc_group_cluster_master splunk_server_group=$dmc_group$ /services/properties/server/clustering/site_mappings | table splunk_server value | rename value as site_mappings]
| eval stanza="clustering" | eval conf="server.conf"
| table splunk_server cluster_label conf stanza summary_replication multisite heartbeat_timeout replication_factor search_factor available_sites site_* service_interval

| rest /services/server/sysinfo splunk_server_group=dmc_group_indexer splunk_server_group=$dmc_group$ | search splunk_server IN $host_list$ | search splunk_server IN $host$| join splunk_server [| rest /services/server/info splunk_server_group=dmc_group_indexer splunk_server_group=$dmc_group$ | search splunk_server IN $host_list$ |search splunk_server IN $host$ ] | table splunk_server version numberOfCores, numberOfVirtualCores physicalMemoryMB ulimits.open_files transparent_hugepages.effective_state | sort +splunk_server

panel.html:
Maximum Physical Memory Usage Deployment-Wide
Description: Shows maximum physical memory usage percentage across members of the selected group.

html.p: Recommended Action:Review Monitoring Console Resource Usage Instance views to determine the processes consuming the most memory.
Click chart for per host detail.

search.query: | search host IN $host$ | timechart $span$ max(mem_used) as "memory_used" min(capacity) as "capacity_min" max(capacity) as "capacity_max"
| search host IN $host$ | timechart $span$ max(mem_used) as "memory_used" latest(capacity) as "capacity" by host

panel.html:
Maximum Load Average Deployment-Wide
Description: Shows maximum normalized 1m load avg based on physical cpu core count across all members of the selected group.

html.p: Recommended Action:Sustained values above 1 are concerning (1=100% cpu system utilization), review Monitoring Console Resource Usage Instance views to determine the processes consuming the most cpu.
Click chart for per host detail.

search.query: | search host IN $host$ | timechart $span$ max(normalized_load_avg_1min) as "normalized_load_avg_1min" | eval ceiling=1
| search host IN $host$ | timechart $span$ max(normalized_load_avg_1min) as "normalized_load_avg_1min" by host | eval ceiling=1

panel.title: Maximum CPU usage by Splunk process class

search.query: index=_introspection sourcetype=splunk_resource_usage component=PerProcess host=$p$ | eval process = 'data.process' | eval args = 'data.args' | eval pid = 'data.pid' | eval ppid = 'data.ppid' | eval elapsed = 'data.elapsed' | eval mem_used = 'data.mem_used' | eval mem = 'data.mem' | eval pct_memory = 'data.pct_memory' | eval normalized_pct_cpu = 'data.normalized_pct_cpu' | eval pct_cpu = 'data.pct_cpu' | eval sid = 'data.search_props.sid' | eval app = 'data.search_props.app' | eval label = 'data.search_props.label' | eval type = 'data.search_props.type' | eval mode = 'data.search_props.mode' | eval user = 'data.search_props.user' | eval role = 'data.search_props.role' | eval label = if(isnotnull('data.search_props.label'), 'data.search_props.label', "") | eval provenance = if(isnotnull('data.search_props.provenance'), 'data.search_props.provenance', "unknown") | eval search_head = case(isnotnull('data.search_props.search_head') AND 'data.search_props.role' == "peer", 'data.search_props.search_head', isnull('data.search_props.search_head') AND 'data.search_props.role' == "head", "_self", isnull('data.search_props.search_head') AND 'data.search_props.role' == "peer", "_unknown") | eval workload_pool = if(isnotnull('data.workload_pool'), 'data.workload_pool', "UNDEFINED") | eval process_class = case( process=="splunk-optimize","index service", process=="sh" OR process=="ksh" OR process=="bash" OR like(process,"python%") OR process=="powershell","scripted input", process=="mongod", "KVStore") | eval process_class = case( process=="splunkd" AND (like(args,"-p %start%") OR like(args,"service") OR like(args,"%_internal_launch_under_systemd%")),"splunkd server", process=="splunkd" AND isnotnull(sid),"search", process=="splunkd" AND (like(args,"fsck%") OR like(args,"recover-metadata%") OR like(args,"cluster_thing")),"index service", process=="splunkd" AND args=="instrument-resource-usage", "scripted input", (like(process,"python%") AND like(args,"%/appserver/mrsparkle/root.py%")) OR like(process,"splunkweb"),"Splunk Web", isnotnull(process_class), process_class) | eval process_class = if(isnull(process_class),"other",process_class) | bin _time span=10s | eval process = 'data.process' | eval args = 'data.args' | eval pid = 'data.pid' | eval ppid = 'data.ppid' | eval elapsed = 'data.elapsed' | eval mem_used = 'data.mem_used' | eval mem = 'data.mem' | eval pct_memory = 'data.pct_memory' | eval normalized_pct_cpu = 'data.normalized_pct_cpu' | eval pct_cpu = 'data.pct_cpu' | eval sid = 'data.search_props.sid' | eval app = 'data.search_props.app' | eval label = 'data.search_props.label' | eval type = 'data.search_props.type' | eval mode = 'data.search_props.mode' | eval user = 'data.search_props.user' | eval role = 'data.search_props.role' | eval label = if(isnotnull('data.search_props.label'), 'data.search_props.label', "") | eval provenance = if(isnotnull('data.search_props.provenance'), 'data.search_props.provenance', "unknown") | eval search_head = case(isnotnull('data.search_props.search_head') AND 'data.search_props.role' == "peer", 'data.search_props.search_head', isnull('data.search_props.search_head') AND 'data.search_props.role' == "head", "_self", isnull('data.search_props.search_head') AND 'data.search_props.role' == "peer", "_unknown") | eval workload_pool = if(isnotnull('data.workload_pool'), 'data.workload_pool', "UNDEFINED") | stats latest(pct_cpu) AS resource_usage_dedup latest(process_class) AS process_class by pid, _time | stats sum(resource_usage_dedup) AS resource_usage by _time, process_class | timechart span=1m Max(resource_usage) AS "Resource Usage" by process_class

panel.title: Maximum CPU Resource Usage of Searches

search.query: `dmc_set_index_introspection` host=$p$ sourcetype=splunk_resource_usage component=PerProcess data.search_props.sid::* | `dmc_rename_introspection_fields` | `dmc_set_bin` | stats latest(pct_cpu) AS resource_usage_dedup by _time, type, sid, pid | stats sum(resource_usage_dedup) AS sum_resource_usage by _time, type | eval sum_resource_usage = if("pct_cpu" == "pct_cpu", round(sum_resource_usage / 100.0, 2), sum_resource_usage) | timechart $span$ Max(sum_resource_usage) AS "Max of resource usage" by type

panel.title: max cpu pct by sid , label

search.query: index=_introspection host=$p$ sourcetype=splunk_resource_usage component=PerProcess data.search_props.sid::* | rename data.search_props.label as label| fillnull value="ad-hoc" label | stats max(data.pct_cpu) as data.pct_cpu by data.search_props.sid label data.search_props.app data.search_props.provenance data.search_props.user | sort -data.pct_cpu

panel.html:
Maximum Disk latency
Description: The average time (in milliseconds) for I/O requests issued to the device to be served. This includes the time spent by the requests in queue and the time spent servicing them.

html.p: Recommended Action: Use to review Disk latency. Ideal await times for any mount point where Splunk operates is under 10ms

search.query: | search host IN $host$ | timechart $span$ max(avg_total_ms) as "avg_total_ms" | eval ideal_latency_ms=10
| search host IN $host$| timechart $span$ max(avg_total_ms) as "avg_total_ms" by host | eval ideal_latency_ms=10
| search host="$d2$" | timechart $span$ max(avg_total_ms) as "avg_total_ms" by data.mount_point | eval ideal_latency_ms=10

index=_internal search_group="dmc_group_indexer" search_group=$dmc_group$ host IN $host$ sourcetype=splunkd TERM(group=queue) TERM(blocked=true) | timechart $span$ minspan=30s count by host useother=f limit=0

chart.title: blocked queues for $h1$ by queue name

search.query: index=_internal search_group="dmc_group_indexer" search_group=$dmc_group$ host IN $host$ host=$h1$ sourcetype=splunkd TERM(group=queue) TERM(blocked=true) | timechart span=60s minspan=30s count by name useother=f limit=0

index=_internal sourcetype=splunkd source=*splunkd.log search_group="dmc_group_indexer" search_group=$dmc_group$ component=BucketReplicator replication queue for full | stats count by host peer | sort -count | rename host as "source indexer" peer as "target indexer"

index=_internal sourcetype=splunkd source=*splunkd.log search_group="dmc_group_indexer" search_group=$dmc_group$ component=BucketReplicator replication queue for full | timechart count by peer limit=0
| rest /services/server/info splunk_server_group=dmc_group_indexer splunk_server_group=$dmc_group$ | table splunk_server guid | search guid=$guid$

| tstats max(PREFIX(active_searches=)) as active_searches where index::_internal host IN $host_list$ host IN $host$ sourcetype::splunkd_remote_searches by host _time span=30s | timechart span=30s max(active_searches) by host limit=0 useother=f

chart.title: distinct count of real time searches

search.query: | tstats dc(data.search_props.sid) as distinct_search_count where index=_introspection host IN $host_list$ host IN $host$ sourcetype=splunk_resource_usage component=PerProcess "data.search_props.sid"=* "data.search_props.mode"=RT* by host _time span=30s | timechart bins=200 max(distinct_search_count) AS "max rt search concurrency"

| tstats max(data.t_count) as data.t_count where index::_introspection host IN $host_list$ host IN $host$ sourcetype::splunk_resource_usage by host _time span=60s | timechart span=60s max(data.t_count) as "thread count" by host limit=0 | eval danger=500

| tstats max(data.t_count) as data.t_count where index::_introspection host=$f0$ sourcetype::splunk_resource_usage by data.process_type _time span=60s | timechart span=60s max(data.t_count) as "thread count" by data.process_type limit=0 | eval danger=500
index=_internal host=$f0$ sourcetype=splunkd source=*watchdog.log* finally received after | rex "finally received after (?<ms>\d+)\s+ms" | timechart span=1m max(ms) by thread_name limit=0

| rest splunk_server_group=dmc_group_cluster_master splunk_server_group=$dmc_group$ /services/cluster/master/searchheads | fields label, status, site, host_port_pair, title | search label="***" | search status="*" | search site="*" | rename label as "Search Head", status as Status, site as Site, host_port_pair as URI, title as GUID

table.title: The primary_count_remote shows the number of primaries that the peer holds for non-local sites, including site0.

search.query: | rest splunk_server_group=dmc_group_cluster_master splunk_server_group=$dmc_group$ /services/cluster/master/peers | fields label, is_searchable, status, site, bucket_count,primary_count_remote host_port_pair, last_heartbeat, replication_port, base_generation_id, title, bucket_count_by_index.* | eval is_searchable = if(is_searchable == 1 or is_searchable == "1", "Yes", "No") | `dmc_time_format(last_heartbeat)` | sort - last_heartbeat | search label="***" | search is_searchable="*" | search status="*" | search site="*" | fields label, is_searchable, status, site, bucket_count,primary_count_remote | rename label as Peer, is_searchable as "Fully Searchable", status as Status, site as Site, bucket_count as Buckets

| rest splunk_server_group=dmc_group_cluster_master splunk_server_group=$dmc_group$ /services/cluster/master/peers | fields label, is_searchable, status, site, bucket_count,primary_count_remote host_port_pair, last_heartbeat, replication_port, base_generation_id, title, bucket_count_by_index.* | eval is_searchable = if(is_searchable == 1 or is_searchable == "1", "Yes", "No") | `dmc_time_format(last_heartbeat)` | sort - last_heartbeat | search label="***" | search is_searchable="*" | search status="*" | search site="*" | fields label, is_searchable, status, site, bucket_count,primary_count_remote | rename label as Peer, is_searchable as "Fully Searchable", status as Status, site as Site, bucket_count as Buckets | fields Site | dedup Site | table Site

index=_internal search_group="dmc_group_indexer" search_group=$dmc_group$ source=*metrics.log group=clustered_primaries_searches site=$site$ | timechart $span$ max(latest_num_primaries) by host useother=f limit=50

index=_internal search_group="dmc_group_indexer" search_group=$dmc_group$ sourcetype=splunkd source=*metrics.log name=index_thruput | stats sum(kb) as kb by host | eval MB= round(kb/1024,0) | eval GB= round(kb/1024/1024,0) | table host MB GB | sort -GB

panel.title: sum(elapsedTime) spent on search by indexer

chart.title: Imbalance in elapsedTime suggests data ingest imbalance, primaries imbalance, or resource contention and searches will be slowed down by longest pole indexer

search.query: index=_internal search_group="dmc_group_indexer" search_group=$dmc_group$ source=*remote_searches.log* search_id=* | fields host search_id elapsedTime |stats sum(elapsedTime) as elapsedTime by host | sort -elapsedTime

panel.title: sum(elapsedTime) spent on search by indexer compared to sum scan_count and events_count

search.query: index=_internal search_group="dmc_group_indexer" search_group=$dmc_group$ source=*/remote_searches.log | fields host search_id scan_count events_count elapsedTime | search search_id=* scan_count=* elapsedTime=* |stats sum(scan_count) as scan_count sum(events_count) as events_count sum(elapsedTime) as elapsedTime by host | sort -elapsedTime

index=_internal search_group="dmc_group_indexer" search_group=$dmc_group$ host IN $host$ sourcetype=splunkd source=*metrics.log TERM(name=thruput) | timechart span=1m partial=f per_second(kb) AS kbps by host | eval kbps=round(kbps,0)

| tstats sum(PREFIX(new_channels=)) as new_channels where index=_internal host IN $host_list$ host IN $host$ sourcetype::splunkd TERM(group=map) TERM(name=pipelineinputchannel) by host _time span=30s | timechart span=30s max(new_channels) by host limit=0 useother=f | eval instance_channel_threshold=10000

|tstats max(PREFIX(to_fix_streaming=)) as to_fix_streaming max(PREFIX(to_fix_data_safety=)) as to_fix_data_safety max(PREFIX(to_fix_gen=)) as to_fix_gen max(PREFIX(to_fix_rep_factor=)) as to_fix_rep_factor max(PREFIX(to_fix_search_factor=)) as to_fix_search_factor max(PREFIX(to_fix_summary=)) as to_fix_summary max(PREFIX(to_fix_rebalance=)) as to_fix_rebalance max(PREFIX(to_fix_excess=)) as to_fix_excess max(PREFIX(to_fix_sync=)) as to_fix_sync max(PREFIX(to_fix_added=)) as to_fix_added max(PREFIX(to_fix_removed=)) as to_fix_removed max(PREFIX(to_fix_total=)) as to_fix_total where index=_internal host=$cm$ sourcetype::splunkd TERM(name=cmmaster_service) TERM(group=subtask_counts) by host _time $span$ | timechart $span$ max(to_fix_streaming) as to_fix_streaming max(to_fix_data_safety) as to_fix_data_safety max(to_fix_gen) as to_fix_gen max(to_fix_rep_factor) as to_fix_rep_factor max(to_fix_search_factor) as to_fix_search_factor max(to_fix_summary) as to_fix_summary max(to_fix_rebalance) as to_fix_rebalance max(to_fix_excess) as to_fix_excess max(to_fix_sync) as to_fix_sync max(to_fix_added) as to_fix_added max(to_fix_removed) as to_fix_removed max(to_fix_total) as to_fix_total

panel.title: search heads which spawned datamodel accelerations

table.title: confirm that no more than 1 SH deployment is dispatching the same datamodel acceleration to the index cluster selected.

search.query: index=_introspection search_group="dmc_group_indexer" search_group=$dmc_group$ sourcetype=splunk_resource_usage source=*resource_usage.log "data.search_props.provenance"=scheduler "data.search_props.type"="datamodel acceleration" | rex "_ACCELERATE_DM_\w([^_]+)\_(?<datamodel_acceleration>\S+)_ACCELERATE_"| stats values(data.search_props.search_head) as "dispatching search head" by datamodel_acceleration

table.title: datamodels which take longer than 300s should be looked into. datamodels which take over 3000s seconds will get terminated at 3600s and should be inspected. Set summary_replication=true on cluster manager server.conf [clustering] stanza if smartstore is not used.

search.query: index=_introspection search_group="dmc_group_indexer" search_group=$dmc_group$ sourcetype=splunk_resource_usage source=*resource_usage.log "data.search_props.provenance"=scheduler "data.search_props.type"="datamodel acceleration" | rex "_ACCELERATE_DM_\w([^_]+)\_(?<datamodel_acceleration>\S+)_ACCELERATE_"| stats max(data.elapsed) as "max datamodel runtime" by datamodel_acceleration

chart.title: use to measure if there was an increase in searches hitting the indexers

search.query: index=_internal search_group="dmc_group_indexer" search_group=$dmc_group$ host IN $host$ sourcetype=splunkd_access POST /streams/search | timechart count as "search request rate"

index=_internal search_group="dmc_group_indexer" search_group=$dmc_group$ source=*remote_searches.log* search_id=* | fields host search_id elapsedTime |timechart span=5m sum(elapsedTime) as elapsedTime
